<a name="module_unique-reducer"></a>
## unique-reducer
Reduce an array to one or more unique values.

**Example**  
```js
> unique = require('unique-reducer')

> var arr = [ 1, 3, 8, 3, 1, 2, 1, 9, 3, 3 ]

> arr.reduce(unique)
[ 1, 3, 8, 2, 9 ]
```
